Title: Provides a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or volunteer ambulance services in a certain county
Summary: Provides a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or volunteer ambulance services in a certain county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or voluntary ambulance services in a certain county
